metadata.title: CVE-2021-37149 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in header parsing of Apache Traffic Server allows an attacker to smuggle requests. This issue affects Apache Traffic Server 8.0.0 to 8.1.2 and 9.0.0 to 9.1.0.

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
